iiwiki-navigation: Header for navigation section in sidebar
iiwiki-communities: Header for communities/portals section in sidebar
iiwiki-tools: Header for tools section in sidebar
iiwiki-resources: Header for resources section in sidebar
iiwiki-connect: Header for external links section in sidebar
iiwiki-createpage: Link text for creating a new page
iiwiki-standards: Link text for rules and standards page
iiwiki-tagline: Site tagline displayed in header and footer
iiwiki-backtotop: Accessible label for back to top button
